class_notes: Permission of instructor required to enroll.
course_description: This course is required for completion of the MBC Certificate. All students must enroll in this course for at least two semesters (but may enroll for more semesters as desired). This course is designed to provide a sense of community among certificate participants, a source of intellectual input and support, and an opportunity for additional insight into multidisciplinary approaches to the study of mind, brain, and culture.
sections: Class Nbr: 1547, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Stout, Status: Open
